title: How to Install Python 3.13? Use the Interactive Interpreter
author: Jack Wallen
description: This tutorial focuses on the new interactive interpreter in Python 3.13, which features multiline editing with history preservation, direct support for REPL-specific commands including help, exit, quit, and a lot more.
cntitle: 如何安装 Python 3.13？使用交互式解释器
cndescription: 本教程重点介绍 Python 3.13 中新的交互式解释器，该解释器具有多行编辑和历史记录保存功能，并直接支持 REPL 特定的命令，包括 help、exit、quit 等。
